mapper.select: select * from member where mememail=#{param1} and mempw=#{param2}
mapper.insert: insert into member(mememail, mempw, memname, memnick, memphone, membirth, memgender) values (#{mememail},#{mempw},#{memname},#{memnick},#{memphone},#{membirth},#{memgender})
mapper.select: select cridx, crnick from carry where cremail=#{param1} and crpw=#{param2}
mapper.insert: insert into carry(cremail, crpw, crname, crnick, crgender, crphone) values (#{cremail},#{crpw},#{crname},#{crnick},#{crgender},#{crphone})
